lander was one of the bandits under the Iron Fox in the midâ€“8 century DR.
The men of the Iron Fox wore light armor and brought no lances or horses.
When Elminster Aumar, a Chosen of Mystra, carried out a scouring of the bandits in Buckralams Starn, Llander remained with his boss, the Iron Fox, until moments before his death at Fox Tower. They were attacked at the mess hall, where Elminster ambushed them using one or more crossbows from a gallery overlooking them Tarthane then dashed up the gallery on the boss orders, together with fellow bandit Tarthane.
At the top of the stair, Elminster dropped a tapestry on Llander, and then stabbed through the cloth. Llander fell down the stairs blindly, apparently slain.
